title: Sex, Truth & Logic: A Journey of Self-Discovery
description: Is the quantum world a better place to understand sexuality? Sex has never sat comfortably within Western thinking.The world of online sex contacting sites. The creation of the ‘virtual closet’. The opportunity to pervert truth. An exploration of the masks and mirrors of sexual identity.This multi-layered adventure story depicts one man’s search for self-discovery, sexual identity, excitement and freedom.Come along for the ride and join John’s irresistible and eye-opening tour of the demi-worlds of modern tech hook-ups and the old order of backstreet pubs, cottages and cruising grounds. Listen to his profound and fascinating reflections on the changing world of sexual norms.Crossing the genres of eroticism and philosophic literature, this explicit novel is not for the faint-hearted or prudish. Rather, it’s for readers interested in enlightenment, excitement and freedom. People who want to think outside of the prison of social convention.
author: D.R. Michael
